characters.name: King Juan II of Castile
characters.title: King of Castile, León, Aragon, Naples, and Sicily
characters.current_task: Diplomatic mission to Poland; negotiating crusade alliance with Władysław III
characters.speech_style: Earnest and visionary, shifts between grand rhetoric and disarming personal warmth

characters.name: Queen Lucia d'Este
characters.title: Queen of Castile and León
characters.current_task: Managing royal household during Juan's absence; pregnant with seventh child
characters.speech_style: Direct and forthright, argues openly even with Juan, elegant Italian-inflected Castilian

characters.name: Princess Catalina of Castile
characters.title: Princess of Castile
characters.current_task: Education, practicing singing; father plans diplomatic role for her future
characters.speech_style: Precocious and commanding for her age, with a voice that silences rooms when she sings

characters.name: Fernán Alonso de Robles
characters.title: Captain of the Royal Guard
characters.current_task: Military command and royal guard duties
characters.speech_style: Clipped military brevity, respectful but direct

characters.name: Fray Hernando de Talavera
characters.title: Royal Confessor, Hieronymite Friar
characters.current_task: Spiritual counsel to the King
characters.speech_style: Gentle but probing, asks uncomfortable questions rather than giving easy answers

characters.name: Álvaro de Luna
characters.title: Constable of Castile, Count of San Esteban
characters.current_task: Managing kingdom affairs, overseeing administrative reforms
characters.speech_style: Formal and confident, uses flattery with the king, cold precision with rivals

characters.name: Pope Eugenius IV
characters.title: Pope of the Roman Catholic Church
characters.current_task: Church reform; managing Council of Basel relations; alliance with Juan II
characters.speech_style: Papal authority tempered by genuine reforming zeal

characters.name: George Sphrantzes
characters.title: Byzantine court official, historian
characters.current_task: Court duties; diplomatic missions for the Emperor
characters.speech_style: Precise and observant, a historian's eye for detail

characters.name: Kantakouzenos (family head)
characters.title: Head of the Kantakouzenos family
characters.current_task: Managing family interests in changing Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Aristocratic formality, carries weight of ancient Byzantine lineage

characters.name: Tommaso Parentucelli
characters.title: Papal secretary, future Pope Nicholas V
characters.current_task: Leading Camera Apostolica reform; ~60% documentation recovered despite sabotage
characters.speech_style: Scholarly precision, systematic and thorough, humanist's love of knowledge

characters.name: Emperor John VIII Palaiologos
characters.title: Emperor of Byzantium
characters.current_task: Ruling diminished empire; coordinating with Latin garrison; receives 22,000 florin annual pension from Juan
characters.speech_style: Imperial formality masking desperation, proud bearing despite diminished circumstances

characters.name: Doña María de Trastámara
characters.title: Doña María de Trastámara, formerly Queen of Aragon
characters.current_task: Beloved aunt to Juan's children; teaching Aragonese and Catalan customs
characters.speech_style: Warm and maternal, carries grief with quiet dignity, switches between Castilian and Catalan

characters.name: Doña Beatriz
characters.title: Governess to the royal children
characters.current_task: Governess to royal children; managing nursery in parents' absence
personality: remained in Toledo during parents' travels
characters.speech_style: Portuguese-accented Castilian, warm but authoritative with children

characters.name: Gennadios Scholarios
characters.title: Orthodox theologian and scholar
characters.current_task: Theological work; opposing union negotiations with Rome
characters.speech_style: Scholarly eloquence, passionate defender of Orthodox tradition

characters.name: Cardinal Giuliano Cesarini
characters.title: Cardinal, Papal Legate
characters.current_task: Crusade advocacy and coordination with papal diplomacy
characters.speech_style: Eloquent and passionate, inspires with conviction

characters.name: Alfonso V of Aragon
characters.title: King of Aragon, Sicily, and Naples (deceased)
characters.current_task: Legacy: Juan inherited all his crowns after his death September 1437

characters.name: Marco Contarini
characters.title: Venetian diplomatic representative
characters.current_task: Venetian diplomatic representation; monitoring Castilian-Byzantine relations
characters.speech_style: Diplomatic Venetian reserve, precise and measured

characters.name: Theodoros (wall worker)
characters.title: Wall worker, one of the Twelve Apostles of Constantinople
characters.current_task: Supporting Latin settlement integration in Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Pragmatic and direct, cares about practical realities not grand visions

characters.name: Íñigo López de Mendoza
characters.title: Marquess of Santillana, Lord of Hita and Buitrago
characters.current_task: Managing estates; literary and military pursuits
characters.speech_style: Literary elegance combined with martial authority

characters.name: Emperor Sigismund
characters.title: Holy Roman Emperor (deceased)
characters.current_task: Legacy: his death created power vacuum; succeeded by Albert of Habsburg

characters.name: Demetrios (young worker)
characters.title: Young worker, one of the Twelve Apostles of Constantinople
characters.current_task: Supporting Latin settlement integration in Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Passionate and idealistic, youngest voice calling for action

characters.name: Anna (merchant's wife)
characters.title: Merchant's wife, one of the Twelve Apostles of Constantinople
characters.current_task: Supporting Latin settlement integration; raising sons (ages 11 and 14)
characters.speech_style: Motherly and concerned, speaks from a mother's heart

characters.name: Marco Tornesi
characters.title: Military officer
characters.current_task: Military duties
characters.speech_style: Professional soldier's manner

characters.name: Emperor Constantine XI
characters.title: Despot Constantine Dragases Palaiologos
characters.current_task: Governing the Morea; military preparations
characters.speech_style: Soldierly directness, less formal than his brother the Emperor

characters.name: Queen Isabel of Portugal
characters.title: Queen of Castile (deceased)
characters.current_task: Legacy: La Dote de la Reina Isabel perpetual endowment

characters.name: Bessarion of Nicaea
characters.title: Metropolitan of Nicaea, scholar
characters.current_task: Scholarly work; advocating for Church union
characters.speech_style: Elegant Greek and Latin, bridges Eastern and Western intellectual traditions

characters.name: Cardinal Giordano Orsini
characters.title: Cardinal Giordano Orsini
characters.current_task: Papal court duties
characters.speech_style: Aristocratic and measured, carries weight of Roman lineage

characters.name: Don Juan de Sotomayor
characters.title: Commander of Constantinople garrison
characters.current_task: Garrison commander; managing ~715+ Military Order soldiers in Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Military command voice, practical and authoritative

characters.name: Isidore of Kiev
characters.title: Metropolitan of Kiev and All Rus'
characters.current_task: Advocating for Church union; representing Kievan metropolitanate
characters.speech_style: Cosmopolitan churchman, comfortable in multiple languages and traditions

characters.name: Queen Leonor of Portugal
characters.title: Queen of Portugal
characters.current_task: Supporting Portuguese-Castilian family ties
characters.speech_style: Warm and maternal, carries authority of Portuguese crown

characters.name: Bernat de Centelles
characters.title: Aragonese military nobleman
characters.current_task: Military duties
characters.speech_style: Aragonese military nobility, direct

characters.name: Don Luis de Guzmán
characters.title: Master of the Order of Calatrava
characters.current_task: Governing Order of Calatrava; military coordination
characters.speech_style: Military Order authority, formal and commanding

characters.name: Bishop Alfonso de Cartagena
characters.title: Bishop of Burgos
characters.current_task: Episcopal duties; scholarly and diplomatic work
characters.speech_style: Learned and eloquent, carries weight of both scholarship and faith

characters.name: Loukas Notaras
characters.title: Former Byzantine official (deceased, executed for treason)
characters.current_task: Legacy: executed May 16, 1434; treasury enriched by ~20,000-25,000 florins from confiscated wealth

characters.name: Cardinal Jean de Rochetaillée
characters.title: Cardinal Jean de Rochetaillée
characters.current_task: Papal court duties
characters.speech_style: French-accented Latin, diplomatic and careful

characters.name: Patriarch Joseph II
characters.title: Orthodox Patriarch of Constantinople
characters.current_task: Leading Orthodox Church; navigating religious accommodations in Apokatastasis
characters.speech_style: Measured patriarchal authority, cautious about commitments to Latins

characters.name: Cardinal Capranica
characters.title: Cardinal Domenico Capranica
characters.current_task: Papal court duties; reform advocacy
characters.speech_style: Precise canonical reasoning, reform-oriented

characters.name: Diego de Daza
characters.title: Chief Royal Administrator
characters.current_task: Financial administration, managing Royal Mint, tracking silver revenues
characters.speech_style: Precise and methodical, presents data with quiet authority

characters.name: Prince Fernando of Castile
characters.title: Prince of Asturias, Heir to Castile and León
characters.current_task: Education, growing into role as heir
characters.speech_style: Bold and decisive for a young child, speaks his mind with confidence

characters.name: Archbishop Cerezuela of Toledo
characters.title: Archbishop of Toledo
characters.current_task: Governing the Archdiocese of Toledo
characters.speech_style: Archiepiscopal authority, formal Castilian

characters.name: Don Fadrique
characters.title: Castilian nobleman and military commander
characters.current_task: Military and noble duties
characters.speech_style: Castilian military nobility, direct

characters.name: Benedetto Fregoso
characters.title: Genoese nobleman
characters.current_task: Genoese political maneuvering
characters.speech_style: Proud Genoese manner

characters.name: René of Anjou
characters.title: Duke of Anjou, titular King of Naples
characters.current_task: Pursuing Naples claim; managing Angevin interests
characters.speech_style: French courtly elegance, cultured and persistent

characters.name: Stavros
characters.title: Constantinople citizen
characters.current_task: Daily life in Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Common Greek, practical manner

characters.name: Jacopo de' Bardi
characters.title: Florentine banker
characters.current_task: Banking operations
characters.speech_style: Professional banker manner, careful with commitments

characters.name: Cardinal Albergati
characters.title: Cardinal Niccolò Albergati
characters.current_task: Papal court duties; peace advocacy
characters.speech_style: Gentle and humble, carries moral authority

characters.name: Hamza Bey
characters.title: Ottoman diplomatic secretary
characters.current_task: Ottoman diplomatic duties
characters.speech_style: Formal diplomatic manner, precise about protocol

characters.name: Captain Vargas
characters.location: Ionian Sea to Crete, Harbor of Candia

characters.name: Chrysoloras
characters.title: Head of the Chrysoloras family
characters.current_task: Family affairs; scholarly pursuits
characters.speech_style: Scholarly Byzantine Greek, intellectual bearing

characters.name: Jean de Lastic
characters.title: Grand Master of the Knights Hospitaller
characters.current_task: Leading Knights Hospitaller; coordinating with crusade planning
characters.speech_style: Crusader-monk authority, blends piety with military pragmatism

characters.name: Lope de Barrientos
characters.title: Bishop of Cuenca
characters.current_task: Episcopal governance; supporting royal policies
characters.speech_style: Authoritative churchman, politically aware

characters.name: Princess Bianca of Castile
characters.title: Princess of Castile
characters.current_task: Flourishing after emotional crisis; sewing, being nurturing big sister
characters.speech_style: Intense and emotional, shifts quickly between moods

characters.name: Raffaele Lomellini
characters.title: Genoese representative
characters.current_task: Managing Genoese commercial interests
characters.speech_style: Commercial pragmatism, direct about business

characters.name: Sultan Murad II
characters.title: Sultan of the Ottoman Empire
characters.current_task: Ruling Ottoman Empire; managing truce with Castile (expires 1445)
characters.speech_style: Measured imperial authority, engages diplomatically when advantageous

characters.name: Theodoros Kantakouzenos
characters.title: Kantakouzenos family member
characters.current_task: Family affairs in Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Byzantine aristocratic formality

characters.name: Tommaso di Campofregoso
characters.title: Doge of Genoa
characters.current_task: Governing Genoa; managing factional politics
characters.speech_style: Authoritative but wary of factional opposition

characters.name: Canon Giuliano della Rovere
characters.title: Canon Giuliano della Rovere
characters.current_task: Ecclesiastical career; observing papal politics
characters.speech_style: Sharp and ambitious, watches everything carefully

characters.name: Demetrios Komnenos
characters.title: Shadow guardian of the royal family
characters.current_task: Shadow protection of royal family
characters.speech_style: Rarely speaks; communicates through presence and action

characters.name: Pedro Fernández de Velasco
characters.title: Count of Haro
characters.current_task: Managing estates; Castilian noble politics
characters.speech_style: Northern Castilian gravity, measured authority

characters.name: Pedro Manrique
characters.title: Adelantado Mayor of León
characters.current_task: Managing estates; noble political activity
characters.speech_style: Aristocratic authority, political maneuvering

characters.name: Tomás de Torquemada
characters.title: Dominican friar
characters.current_task: Religious observation; approved of Fernando's genuine faith, concerned by Catalina's performed piety
characters.speech_style: Careful and measured, watches more than he speaks, says nothing publicly

characters.name: Anna Kantakouzenos
characters.title: Kantakouzenos family member
characters.current_task: Family affairs in Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Refined Byzantine Greek, aristocratic bearing

characters.name: Cardinal Colonna
characters.title: Cardinal Prospero Colonna
characters.current_task: Papal court duties
characters.speech_style: Aristocratic bearing, politically astute

characters.name: Cardinal Condulmer
characters.title: Cardinal Francesco Condulmer
characters.current_task: Papal court duties; supporting Eugenius IV
characters.speech_style: Deferential to his uncle the Pope, formal

characters.name: Diego Hurtado de Mendoza
characters.title: Admiral of Castile
characters.current_task: Naval oversight; Mendoza family affairs
characters.speech_style: Aristocratic naval authority

characters.name: Eudokia
characters.title: Byzantine noblewoman
characters.current_task: Navigating life in Latin-influenced Constantinople
characters.speech_style: Refined Byzantine Greek

characters.name: Hans the Elder
characters.title: German mining expert
characters.current_task: Mining operations
characters.speech_style: German practical manner, few words

characters.name: Heinrich Möller
characters.title: German mining engineer
characters.current_task: Mining operations
characters.speech_style: Technical German precision

characters.name: Louis Aléman
characters.title: Cardinal Louis Aléman, President of the Council of Basel
characters.current_task: Leading Council of Basel opposition to Eugenius IV
characters.speech_style: Defiant and principled, invokes conciliar authority

characters.name: Marquess Niccolò III d'Este
characters.title: Marquess of Ferrara
characters.current_task: Ruling Ferrara; maintaining family ties with Castile via Lucia
personality: genuinely warm toward Juan as family
interests: family ties with Castile through Lucia
characters.speech_style: Warm and avuncular with family, shrewd in politics

characters.name: Pablo de Santa María
characters.title: Bishop of Burgos (emeritus, deceased)
characters.current_task: Legacy: towering figure in converso community, predecessor to Alfonso de Cartagena

characters.name: Queen Joanna II of Naples
characters.title: Queen of Naples (deceased)
characters.current_task: Legacy: her death precipitated Naples succession crisis

characters.name: Admiral Ataíde
characters.title: Commander of combined Castilian-Portuguese fleet
characters.current_task: Naval administration; commanding combined fleet
characters.speech_style: Professional naval officer's manner, Portuguese-accented Castilian

characters.name: Admiral Vilaragut
characters.title: Aragonese naval officer serving Castile
characters.current_task: Naval administration; coordinating with Portuguese fleet
characters.speech_style: Aragonese naval manner, practical

characters.name: Ban Miklós Újlaki
characters.title: Ban of Macsó, Hungarian frontier lord
characters.current_task: Military planning; coordinating Hungarian contribution; advising on frontier realities
characters.speech_style: Direct military manner, pragmatic, willing to share hard truths privately

characters.name: Bishop Zbigniew Oleśnicki
characters.title: Cardinal-Bishop of Kraków
characters.current_task: Advising Władysław; preparing formal alliance treaties; managing Church support for crusade
characters.speech_style: Formal and precise, diplomatic, demands specifics over promises

characters.name: Captain Gonzalo de Córdoba
characters.title: Captain
characters.current_task: Military command duties
characters.speech_style: Professional military bearing, brief and to the point

characters.name: Cosimo de' Medici
characters.title: Principal of Banco dei Medici, Florence
characters.current_task: Managing Medici Bank; implementing Conventio Bancaria Medici with Castile; planning Constantinople branch
characters.speech_style: Candid and direct, professional banker manner, judges men by their understanding

characters.name: Don Rodrigo de Ponce
characters.title: Andalusian salt merchant
characters.current_task: Managing Andalusian salt production
characters.speech_style: Andalusian gentleman merchant, family pride in trade

characters.name: Fra Bartholomew Texier
characters.title: Master General of the Order of Preachers (Dominicans)
characters.current_task: Overseeing Dominican expansion in Castile (three houses established)
personality: strongly favorable to Juan after 50,000 florin donation
characters.speech_style: French-accented Latin, sharp-eyed authority of a mendicant order leader

characters.name: Fray Alonso de Burgos
characters.title: Friar
characters.current_task: Supporting Church reform efforts in Castile
personality: scholarly reserve broken by Juan's sincerity
characters.speech_style: Scholarly but newly impassioned, pledged remaining years to reform

characters.name: Giacomo Ferrante
characters.title: Maestro Salinero of Trapani, Sicily
characters.current_task: Overseeing Sicilian salt production expansion
characters.speech_style: Direct manner of a practical expert, sun-darkened hands tell his story

characters.name: Hans Wenzel
characters.title: Strasbourg type-casting specialist, future Royal Printer
characters.location: En route to Toledo (expected arrival late Spring 1439)
characters.current_task: Traveling to Castile; preparing printing workshop
characters.speech_style: German craftsman's precision, technical enthusiasm for his developing art

characters.name: Hans von Steinberg
characters.title: Saxon mining engineer
characters.current_task: Managing Granada silver mining operations in Sierra Nevada
personality: expert in Central European mining techniques
characters.speech_style: German-accented technical precision, speaks through expertise

characters.name: Hetman Jan of Koniecpol
characters.title: Hetman Wielki Koronny (Grand Hetman of the Crown)
characters.current_task: Military planning for crusade; advising on logistics and supply
characters.speech_style: Direct and brutally honest military professional; says what others won't

characters.name: Isaac de Baeza
characters.title: Royal Spymaster
characters.current_task: Intelligence coordination, Morocco network oversight, monitoring threats
characters.speech_style: Quiet and measured, reveals only what is necessary

characters.name: Jan Tarnowski
characters.title: Polish noble, representative of the szlachta
characters.current_task: Representing szlachta interests in crusade planning
characters.speech_style: Enthusiastic about cavalry tactics, forthright noble manner

characters.name: King Duarte I of Portugal
characters.title: King of Portugal
characters.current_task: Ruling Portugal; maintaining unprecedented maritime union with Castile
characters.speech_style: Measured and sincere, given to emotion when family is involved

characters.name: King João I of Portugal
characters.title: King of Portugal (deceased)
characters.current_task: Legacy: founded Aviz dynasty; predecessor to Duarte I

characters.name: Marta
characters.title: Seamstress to the royal household
characters.current_task: Seamstress duties; teaching Bianca sewing
characters.speech_style: Patient and encouraging, a teacher's gentle manner

characters.name: Mordecai ben Shlomo
characters.title: Royal Poison Expert
characters.current_task: Poison detection and food safety for royal household
characters.speech_style: Clinical precision with understated warmth, speaks of poisons the way a scholar speaks of texts

characters.name: Musa Keita
characters.title: Malian ambassador, nephew of Mansa's chamberlain
characters.current_task: Investigating Muslim treatment in Castile; reporting to the Mansa
characters.speech_style: Educated Timbuktu manner, fluent Arabic, dignified bearing

characters.name: Prince Henry the Navigator
characters.title: Prince of Portugal, Duke of Viseu
characters.current_task: Coordinating African exploration; joint ventures with Castile along African coast
characters.speech_style: Passionate about exploration, technical when discussing navigation

characters.name: Prince Nicolás de Trastámara
characters.title: Prince of Castile
characters.current_task: Infant care, growing up

characters.name: Princess Juana of Castile
characters.title: Princess of Castile
characters.current_task: Growing up; mysterious illness will strike around age 4-5
characters.speech_style: Too young for formed speech; draws absolute devotion from those around her

characters.name: Princess Teresa María of Castile
characters.title: Princess of Castile
characters.current_task: Growing up, being healthy and happy
characters.speech_style: Cheerful toddler energy, fills rooms with vitality

characters.name: Ser Benedetto
characters.title: Florentine master tailor
characters.current_task: Royal tailor; allowed Bianca to help embroider her own dress
characters.speech_style: Italian-accented Castilian, exacting about his craft

characters.name: Tomás de Córdoba
characters.title: Royal food taster
characters.current_task: Food tasting for royal family
characters.speech_style: Quiet devotion, speaks little about the risks he takes daily

characters.name: Władysław III Jagiellon
characters.title: King of Poland and Hungary
characters.current_task: Hosting Juan II at Wawel Castle; preparing for crusade; planning hunt at Niepołomice
characters.speech_style: Direct Polish manner, passionate about duty, excellent Latin from church tutors, struggles to sit still in formal settings
